Class GenreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bkg16_Music.GenreManager

  • public class GenreManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class GenreManager is responsible for creating, updating, retrieving and deleting Genre records.
    Author:
    bengundy

    • Method Detail

      • createGenre

        public void createGenre(java.lang.String genreName,
                        java.lang.String descr,
                        java.util.Set<Song> genreSongs)
        Method createGenre generates a new Genre record in the ORM object grid.
        Parameters:
        genreName - is the name of the genre.
        descr - is a description of the genre.
        genreSongs - is the songs associated with the genre.

      • updateGenre

        public void updateGenre(java.lang.String genreID,
                        java.lang.String genreName,
                        java.lang.String descr,
                        java.util.Set<Song> genreSongs)
        Method updateGenre updates a Genre record in the ORM object grid.
        Parameters:
        genreID - is the identifying UUID of the target Genre.
        genreName - is the name of the genre.
        descr - is a description of the genre.
        genreSongs - is the songs associated with the genre.

      • deleteGenre

        public void deleteGenre(int genreID)
        Method deleteGenre removes a Genre record from the ORM object grid.
        Parameters:
        genreID - is the identifying UUID of the target Genre.

      • getGenre

        public Genre getGenre(java.lang.String genreID)
        Method getGenre locates a Genre record in the ORM object grid using its genreID.
        Parameters:
        genreID - is the identifying UUID of the target Genre.
        Returns:
        is the Genre object.

      • getGenreList

        public org.json.JSONArray getGenreList(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                       java.lang.String searchType)
        Method getGenreList returns a set of genres that fit the incoming search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - is the string target of the search.
        searchType - is the portion of the genre name that must match the searchTerm.
        Returns:
        is a JSON array containing a list of genres that fit the incoming search criteria.

      • getGenreListBySongID

        public org.json.JSONArray getGenreListBySongID(java.lang.String songID)
        Method getGenreListBySongID returns a set of genres that are linked to the incoming songID.
        Parameters:
        songID - is the ID of the song to be used in the search.
        Returns:
        is a JSON array containing a list of genres that are linked to the songID.
